name: TONMISHISHO demo
description:
You are just a random stranger, helping out a ramen shop. You think it would be easy and won't be for long. but you end up at the other side of an interrogation table. You are accused for the murder of your landlord at the same ramen shop that you helped out. Recall the day before the murder and explore an interesting world full of color and mystery! The fate of your testimony is in your hands. Find out the truth or don't...you decide This game is a student project/capstone project for the YorkU's Digital Media course, EECS 4700. Despite being finished for the course, it is still considered as an early prototype. Thus, this does not fully represent the game as a whole and may be suspectible to changes in the future.

Joseph Yong - Producer, main programmer, main artist, main writer, main 3D modeller, main UI designer

Rayjay - music, assisting programmer, animation

Emmanuel - assisting artist, assisting UI designer
